sections.title: Build your site with Constructor Script

content.text: A modern platform for building content-driven websites.
Constructor Script gives you a modern editorial workflow and a polished default theme so you can publish in minutes instead of weeks.
Use flexible page sections, prebuilt templates, and smart defaults to shape landing pages, documentation, or marketing sites with ease.

items: Intuitive admin dashboard for writers and editors
Theme-aware sections for showcasing your content
Fast, secure Go backend with a focus on reliability

content.text: Reuse sections to highlight features, services, or case studies side by side without touching code.
Mix paragraphs, images, and lists - each card automatically adapts to fill the available space.
Responsive defaults ensure every card stays legible from widescreen dashboards to mobile phones.
Subscribe to updates, follow us on social channels, and join the community shaping the future of Constructor Script.
